text: "Two Out of Three Ain't Bad" is a 1978 song by Meat Loaf. It was taken from his best selling album Bat Out of Hell. It went to number 5 in Canada, number 9 in New Zealand, number 11 in Australia, Austria and the United States, number 25 in Ireland and number 32 in the United Kingdom. It has been covered by Bonnie Tyler and Julian Austin. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Meat Loaf songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:Julian Austin (musician) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Two Out of Three Ain't Bad
